title: how to install Vmware workstation on manjaro
content:
https://forum.manjaro.org/t/wiki-installing-vmware/19824

https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/VMware

http://appnee.com/vmware-workstation-811-universal-license-keys-for-win-lin/

sudo mkdir /etc/init.d
sudo pacman -S linux420-headers
yay -S vmware-systemd-services

chmod +x VMware-Workstation-Full-15.0.2-10952284.x86_64.bundle 
sudo ./VMware-Workstation-Full-15.0.2-10952284.x86_64.bundle 

sudo systemctl start vmware
sudo systemctl enable vmware
sudo vmware-modconfig --console --install-all
